revised_title: Kinetics of CN Emission in Active Nitrogen: The Excitation of CN
tldr: The authors studied the kinetics of reactions involving CN emission in active nitrogen and found that CN radicals are excited by energetic species formed in nitrogen atom recombination. They also discovered that the presence of carbonaceous impurities in active nitrogen causes strong blue CN emission from levels of the state up to B, and the kinetics of this emission have been studied.
